diff_hunk:
@@ -26,7 +26,8 @@ load(
 
 tf_custom_op_py_library(
     name = "rnn_py",
-    srcs = ["__init__.py"] + glob(["python/ops/*.py"]),

body:
How about this instead:
  srcs = ["__init__.py", "python/tools/checkpoint_convert.py"] + glob(["python/ops/*.py"])
This excludes the test by not using the glob, instead of moving the test into its own directory (creating two directories with one file each).
